page.title: 01EAST WELLOW NEAR ROMSEY
page.content: The area (East Wellow)is near Romsey, bordering from the north by the main road from Romsey to Salisbury.The area has many fields and chicken farms.The crops that are grown are barley, wheat and oil seed rape. There are some pigs,cows and chickens in East Wellow. Most people are quite wealthy, they own quite big houses and gardens.The houses that are thatched are mainly from Tudor times. There is a church in the middle of East Wellow which is called St. Margarets.There are only a limited range of shops selling mainly essential goods.There are not many leisure facilities but there is a nearby golf course.Many of the lanes are narrow which is becoming an increasing problem as the population in this much sought after area grows.
